name: yt-link
description: An application to download YouTube videos as MP3s, either individually or as a whole playlist.

scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules frontend/node_modules package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json frontend/.next dist service/dist service/build
scripts.build:python: pip install -r service/requirements.txt && pyinstaller service/app.py --name yt-link-backend --onefile --distpath service/dist --workpath service/build --noconfirm
scripts.build: npm install && npm run clean && npm run build:python && npm run build:frontend && npm run dist
scripts.build:frontend: npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend

author: Steven Ou
